description.zh-cn: 蒋经国与蒋方良的次子，曾任中华民国驻新加坡及日本代表。因江南案被外放，后于预定接任华视董事长前一日猝逝。
description.en: The second son of Chiang Ching-kuo and Faina Vakhreva (Chiang Fang-liang), who served as the Republic of China's representative to Singapore and Japan. He was posted abroad following the Henry Liu case and died suddenly the day before he was scheduled to take over as chairman of CTS.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国第6、7任总统，蒋中正长子，蒋孝武之父。
description.en: The 6th and 7th President of the Republic of China, eldest son of Chiang Kai-shek, and father of Chiang Hsiao-wu.

description.zh-cn: 蒋经国之妻，原名芬娜·伊巴提娃·瓦哈瑞娃，白俄罗斯人。
description.en: Wife of Chiang Ching-kuo, born Faina Ipatyevna Vakhreva in Belarus.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治家及军事家，曾任中华民国总统，蒋孝武的祖父。
description.en: A Chinese politician, revolutionary and military leader who served as the leader of the Republic of China, and grandfather of Chiang Hsiao-wu.

description.zh-cn: 蒋孝武的第一任妻子。
description.en: First wife of Chiang Hsiao-wu.

description.zh-cn: 蒋孝武的第二任妻子。
description.en: Second wife of Chiang Hsiao-wu.

description.zh-cn: 蒋孝武与汪长诗之子。
description.en: Son of Chiang Hsiao-wu and Wang Chang-shih.

description.zh-cn: 蒋孝武与汪长诗之女。
description.en: Daughter of Chiang Hsiao-wu and Wang Chang-shih.

description.zh-cn: 蒋经国长子，蒋孝武的哥哥。
description.en: Eldest son of Chiang Ching-kuo, older brother of Chiang Hsiao-wu.

description.zh-cn: 蒋经国之女，蒋孝武的姐姐。
description.en: Daughter of Chiang Ching-kuo, older sister of Chiang Hsiao-wu.

description.zh-cn: 蒋经国三子，蒋孝武的弟弟。
description.en: Third son of Chiang Ching-kuo, younger brother of Chiang Hsiao-wu.

description.zh-cn: 蒋中正次子，中华民国陆军二级上将，蒋孝武的叔父。
description.en: Second son of Chiang Kai-shek, a general in the Republic of China Army, and uncle of Chiang Hsiao-wu.

description.zh-cn: 指台湾作家刘宜良在美国遭枪杀的政治谋杀事件，因其笔名为“江南”而得名。此案牵涉到台湾的情报机构，并对蒋氏家族的声誉造成重创。
description.en: Refers to the political assassination of Taiwanese writer Henry Liu in the United States. The case implicated Taiwan's intelligence agencies and severely damaged the reputation of the Chiang family.

description.zh-cn: 美籍华裔作家，笔名“江南”，因撰写《蒋经国传》而在美国遭台湾情报人员买凶杀害。
description.en: A Chinese-American writer, pen name 'Chiang Nan', who was assassinated in the U.S. by killers hired by Taiwanese intelligence personnel for writing a biography of Chiang Ching-kuo.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国防部主要的情报搜集单位。
description.en: The primary intelligence gathering agency of the Ministry of National Defense of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 台湾著名的国际性黑社会组织。
description.en: A prominent international organized crime group based in Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国海军二级上将，曾任国防部情报局局长，因江南案下台。
description.en: An admiral in the Republic of China Navy, former director of the Military Intelligence Bureau, who stepped down due to the Henry Liu case.

description.zh-cn: 台湾黑道人物，竹联帮元老，曾指控蒋孝武为江南案主谋，后承认是臆测。
description.en: A Taiwanese gangster, a veteran of the United Bamboo Gang, who once accused Chiang Hsiao-wu of being the mastermind of the Henry Liu case, but later admitted it was speculation.

description.zh-cn: 台湾女歌星，曾与蒋孝武有过一段恋情。
description.en: A Taiwanese female singer who once had a romantic relationship with Chiang Hsiao-wu.

description.zh-cn: 曾与蒋孝武传出绯闻。
description.en: Was rumored to have a romantic relationship with Chiang Hsiao-wu.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国大陆时期的直辖市，战时首都，蒋孝武的出生地。
description.en: A direct-controlled municipality during the mainland period of the Republic of China, the wartime capital, and the birthplace of Chiang Hsiao-wu.

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾台北市的私立综合大学。
description.en: A private comprehensive university located in Taipei, Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 蒋孝武曾担任其第一任董事长的公司。
description.en: A company where Chiang Hsiao-wu served as the first chairman.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的广播事业机构，蒋孝武曾任其总经理。
description.en: A broadcasting company in the Republic of China, where Chiang Hsiao-wu once served as general manager.

nodes.id: 中华民国驻新加坡代表

zh-cn: 中华民国驻新加坡代表

description.zh-cn: 中华民国在新加坡的外交职务。
description.en: A diplomatic position of the Republic of China in Singapore.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国在日本的外交职务。
description.en: A diplomatic position of the Republic of China in Japan.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国第8、9任总统，曾出席蒋孝武丧礼。
description.en: The 8th and 9th President of the Republic of China, who attended Chiang Hsiao-wu's funeral.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国第8任副总统，曾出席蒋孝武丧礼。
description.en: The 8th Vice President of the Republic of China, who attended Chiang Hsiao-wu's funeral.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事及政治人物，曾任行政院院长，曾出席蒋孝武丧礼。
description.en: A military and political figure in the Republic of China, who served as Premier and attended Chiang Hsiao-wu's funeral.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国培养陆军军官的军事院校。
description.en: A military academy for the army of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于德国慕尼黑的政治学院。
description.en: A school of political science in Munich, Germany.

nodes.id: 中华民国国家安全会议

zh-cn: 中华民国国家安全会议
en: National Security Council of the Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 蒋孝武是蒋经国的次子。
description.en: Chiang Hsiao-wu is the second son of Chiang Ching-kuo.

description.zh-cn: 蒋孝武是蒋方良的次子。
description.en: Chiang Hsiao-wu is the second son of Chiang Fang-liang.

description.zh-cn: 蒋友松是蒋孝武的儿子。
description.en: Chiang Yu-sung is the son of Chiang Hsiao-wu.

description.zh-cn: 蒋友兰是蒋孝武的女儿。
description.en: Chiang Yu-lan is the daughter of Chiang Hsiao-wu.

description.zh-cn: 蒋友松是汪长诗的儿子。
description.en: Chiang Yu-sung is the son of Wang Chang-shih.

description.zh-cn: 蒋友兰是汪长诗的女儿。
description.en: Chiang Yu-lan is the daughter of Wang Chang-shih.

description.zh-cn: 蒋孝武于1968年与汪长诗结婚，两人于1975年离婚。
description.en: Chiang Hsiao-wu married Wang Chang-shih in 1968, and they divorced in 1975.

description.zh-cn: 蒋孝武于1986年与蔡惠媚结婚，婚姻关系因蒋孝武逝世而结束。
description.en: Chiang Hsiao-wu married Tsai Hui-mei in 1986; the marriage ended with his death.

description.zh-cn: 蒋孝文是蒋孝武的哥哥。
description.en: Chiang Hsiao-wen is the older brother of Chiang Hsiao-wu.

description.zh-cn: 蒋孝章是蒋孝武的姐姐。
description.en: Chiang Hsiao-chang is the older sister of Chiang Hsiao-wu.

description.zh-cn: 蒋孝勇是蒋孝武的弟弟。
description.en: Chiang Hsiao-yung is the younger brother of Chiang Hsiao-wu.

description.zh-cn: 蒋经国是蒋中正的长子。
description.en: Chiang Ching-kuo is the eldest son of Chiang Kai-shek.

description.zh-cn: 蒋纬国是蒋经国的弟弟（名义上）。
description.en: Chiang Wei-kuo is the (nominal) younger brother of Chiang Ching-kuo.

description.zh-cn: 蒋中正是蒋孝武的祖父。
description.en: Chiang Kai-shek is the grandfather of Chiang Hsiao-wu.

description.zh-cn: 蒋纬国是蒋孝武的叔父。
description.en: Chiang Wei-kuo is the uncle of Chiang Hsiao-wu.

description.zh-cn: 蒋孝武出生于重庆。
description.en: Chiang Hsiao-wu was born in Chungking.

description.zh-cn: 蒋孝武担任荣电公司第一任董事长。
description.en: Chiang Hsiao-wu served as the first chairman of Rongdian Company.

description.zh-cn: 蒋经国对蒋孝武进行特殊安排，使其进入国家安全会议。
description.en: Chiang Ching-kuo made special arrangements for Chiang Hsiao-wu to enter the National Security Council.

relationships.target: 中华民国国家安全会议

description.zh-cn: 在江南案中，国防部情报局授意竹联帮杀手暗杀刘宜良。
description.en: In the Henry Liu case, the Military Intelligence Bureau instructed assassins from the United Bamboo Gang to assassinate Henry Liu.

description.zh-cn: 在江南案中，竹联帮成员刺杀了刘宜良。
description.en: In the Henry Liu case, members of the United Bamboo Gang assassinated Henry Liu.

description.zh-cn: 因被怀疑是江南案主谋，蒋孝武从此失宠，被外放至新加坡及日本。
description.en: Suspected of being the mastermind behind the Henry Liu case, Chiang Hsiao-wu fell out of favor and was posted to Singapore and Japan.

description.zh-cn: 时任情报局局长汪希苓因江南案下台。
description.en: Then-Director of the Intelligence Bureau, Wang Hsi-ling, stepped down due to the Henry Liu case.

description.zh-cn: 张安乐曾于1985年指出蒋孝武是江南案的幕后主使，后于2013年承认该指控为无证据的臆测。
description.en: In 1985, Chang An-lo identified Chiang Hsiao-wu as the mastermind behind the Henry Liu case, but later admitted in 2013 that the accusation was speculation without evidence.

relationships.target: 中华民国驻新加坡代表
中华民国驻新加坡代表

description.zh-cn: 蒋孝武公开批评其叔父蒋纬国竞选总统，使其失去竞选的正当性。
description.en: Chiang Hsiao-wu publicly criticized his uncle Chiang Wei-kuo's presidential bid, causing him to lose the legitimacy of his campaign.

description.zh-cn: 1970年代初，蒋孝武与歌星崔苔菁陷入热恋。
description.en: In the early 1970s, Chiang Hsiao-wu and singer Tsui Tai-ching were passionately in love.

description.zh-cn: 1984年4月，蒋孝武与郑绵绵传出绯闻。
description.en: In April 1984, rumors of a romantic relationship between Chiang Hsiao-wu and Cheng Mien-mien emerged.

description.zh-cn: 时任总统李登辉出席蒋孝武的丧礼并致祭。
description.en: Then-President Lee Teng-hui attended and paid his respects at the funeral of Chiang Hsiao-wu.

description.zh-cn: 时任副总统李元簇出席蒋孝武的丧礼并致祭。
description.en: Then-Vice President Li Yuan-tsu attended and paid his respects at the funeral of Chiang Hsiao-wu.

description.zh-cn: 时任行政院院长郝柏村出席蒋孝武的丧礼并致祭。
description.en: Then-Premier Hau Pei-tsun attended and paid his respects at the funeral of Chiang Hsiao-wu.
